column3: London School of Business and Finance Online
column5: Take the next step and earn your MPH to become a leader in public healthRecent years have shown the world the growing need for more professionals in health fields. The pandemic has brought about a new reality which has redefined many previously-held beliefs about the global healthcare systems. TheLondon School of Business & Financeis proud to offer aMaster of Public Healthto educate the future leaders of the healthcare industry. To increase your chances of landing that dream job, this MPH programme combines academic and applied vocational and developmental training inpublic health practice.
